assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflict of interest or competing interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The CIUSSS Saguenay-Lac-St-Jean Research Ethics Committee has confirmed that no ethical approval is required, in view of the nature of the study, since all procedures were performed as part of the routine clinical care.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Upon request to the corresponding author, the unpublished data related to this study will be available. The previously unpublished DNA variants identified in this study have been submitted to the public genetic database ClinVar (ExternalRef removed).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent for testing was obtained from participants (patients or their legal guardian).

title: First glance at the molecular etiology of hearing loss in French-Canadian families from Saguenay-Lac-Saint-Jean’s founder population
